response.original_title: The Truth Exposed: Our Journeys To Rome
response.overview: This is the story of four ordained Protestant Ministers who gave up everything - careers, homes, even families - in their profound search for the truth. Through fervent prayer and rigorous examination of the Scriptures they all came to the same conclusion: The Church that has sustained the 'Fullness of the Truth' was the Catholic Church founded by Jesus Christ Himself 2000 years ago.
response.title: The Truth Exposed: Our Journeys To Rome
